import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './App.css' import axios from 'axios' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const Crud = () => { const [allData, setAllData] = useState([]); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const recordPerPage = 5; const lastIndex = currentPage * recordPerPage; const firstIndex = lastIndex - recordPerPage; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8000/list') .then(result => setAllData(result.data)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) const records = allData.slice(firstIndex,lastIndex); },[]) console.log(allData) return (<>
Manage Employees
{ allData.map((d)=>( )) }
Name Email Address Phone Action
{d.name} {d.email} {d.address} {d.phone} ||
) } export default Crud
